I´M XP user
I´m Xp User

This game is really, really fun. For all the XP users: Vista will run this game much more smoothly - providing that your computer could run it in the first place.

If you don't have Vista, and don't have a problem with installing another Operating System and dual booting (or just installing over XP altogether), download a 32-bit version of Vista here:

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3729175/Windows.Vista.Ultimate.Preactivated-Pirattracker

I'm running that version right now, and no problems thus far.

One more thing - I did actually have one problem. I was missing two files: d3dx9_31.dll and xinput1_3.dll. 

I thought that first file had something to do with Directx 9 or something so I updated on my computer... nothing happened. 

Since I had installed on XP I figured I already had those files. I did, and I put them in the Windows folder in Vista and it worked.

Everything's cool but if I can make a suggestion... It would have been very nice if ,in the game info on this site or in the game file , you could put the amount of space needed after unzipping/raring  because somtimes you don't expect that the game will take lots of it.

Anyway like always good releasse :)

This is a message to Whelsh and all ppl with D3dx9_31.dll file problem... The reason is quite simple, as you can imagine dx9 means directx 9 so I'd recommend to download the LATEST ( always search for the latest one) DirectX 9.0c install and play... :)
